post.text: California, stay in line! It's the last day to early vote for Hillary. Have a question at the polls? Call 1-844-IM4-HILL.

comment.author: Noel
comment.text: I hate republicans with the heat of a thousand suns for pushing this orange faced megalomaniac on our national stage and embarrassing us to the rest of the world. If you support this clear and present danger, don't ever tell me you're a patriot and you love this country. You don't. You would blow up our world with this dangerous lunatic.

replies.author: Douglas
replies.text: We wouldn't need Trump if it wasn't for corrupt politicians like Hillary.

replies.author: Andrew
replies.text: Noel, I've never met you. I'm a republican. Hate seems like such a strong word. Praying you can find peace in your soul (or at least give medication a try)

replies.author: Abigail
replies.text: He legit beat 17 other candidates. What do you expect?

replies.author: Zachary
replies.text: I would like to remind Rebecca Trump that the system is not rigged instead you might lose because you are unfit, unstable, unprepared, a bully, a tax cheat, a pervert, a racist, narcissist, shallow, a person that have no respect for women or disabled people. and even worse hes a heartless individual.
